entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy this morning with 60 percent chance of flurries or drizzle this afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. Temperature steady near plus 2. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 70 percent chance of flurries changing to 30 percent chance of flurries near midnight. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Clearing. High minus 1.
